## Summary 

```{r}
sum1 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set001.csv")
sum2 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set002.csv")
sum3 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set003.csv")
sum4 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set004.csv")
sum5 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set005.csv")
sum6 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set006.csv")
sum7 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set007.csv")
sum8 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set008.csv")
sum9 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set009.csv")
sum10 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set010.csv")
sum11 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set011.csv")
sum13 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set013.csv")
sum14 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set014.csv")
sum16 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_summary-set016.csv")
sums = rbind(sum1, sum2, sum3, sum4, sum5, sum6, sum7, sum8, sum9, sum10, sum11, sum13, sum14, sum16)
sums
```
```{r fig.width = 5, fig.height=4}
num_noise_files = 16
paste("Total small changes across sets: ", sum(sums$small_changes) / 3)
paste("Total large changes across sets: ", sum(sums$large_changes) / 3 - num_noise_files) 
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(sums$total, sums$small_changes, main="Random", 
     xlab="Total Trials", ylab="Num of Small Changes")
plot(sums$total, sums$large_changes, main="Positive Relationship", 
     xlab="Total Trials", ylab="Num of Large Changes")
plot(sums$small_changes, sums$large_changes, main="Parabolic Relationship?", 
     xlab="Num of Small Changes", ylab="Num of Large Changes")
```

## Sets 

```{r}
data1 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_combos-set001.csv")
data2 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_combos-set002.csv")
data3 = read.csv("diagnostics/diagnostics_combos-set003.csv")
data = rbind(data1, data2, data3)
data
```

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(2,3))
for (i in seq(0,nrow(data) - 3, 3)) {
  matrix = data[(i+1):(i+3),c(2, 4:length(data))]
  d = t(matrix)
  filename = d[1,][1]
  plot(d[-1,1], main="Number Troughs", sub=filename, 
       xlab="Combo", ylab="Number of Troughs", col="black")
  plot(d[-1,2], main="Speed", xlab="Combo", ylab="Speed", col="blue")
  plot(d[-1,3], main="Distance", xlab="Combo", ylab="Distance", col="red")
}
```

## Single Plot

```{r}
matrix = data[3:6,4:length(data)]
d = t(matrix)

plot(d[,1], main="Number Troughs", xlab="Combo", ylab="Number of Troughs")
plot(d[,3], main="Speed", xlab="Combo", ylab="Speed")
plot(d[,2], main="Distance", xlab="Combo", ylab="Distance")
```
